title: Night Stalker
description: All I want is to pay the rent and find a boyfriend. But an insane vampire thinks I hold the key to his takeover of the city, and I have a new stalker.At least for now, I've dodged the Illuminati's Hunters, but life is still a little too challenging. Rival vampire lords want to use me against each other, and the mysterious members of the Columbia Club are offering bounties for vampires and werewolves.I'm lucky that the gang at Rosie's has my back, because I'm going to need them.Contains mature themes.
author: B.R. Kingsolver
